description: ADX-based directional movement strategy optimized for 15-minute timeframe on USDT pairs. Uses directional indicators and momentum for trend following.
author: Unknown

populate_indicators.description: Calculate ADX, directional movement indicators, SAR, and momentum
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate ADX with period 14
2. Calculate Plus DI with period 25
3. Calculate Minus DI with period 25
4. Calculate Parabolic SAR
5. Calculate Momentum with period 14
6. Duplicate indicators with 'sell-' prefix for exit signals

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with ADX indicators: adx, plus_di, minus_di, sar, mom and their sell counterparts
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Uses ADX system to measure trend strength and directional movement indicators to determine trend direction.

populate_buy_trend.description: Generate buy signals when Plus DI crosses above Minus DI with strong trend
populate_buy_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 16 (minimum trend strength)
2. Check Minus DI > 4 (directional filter)
3. Check Plus DI > 20 (bullish strength)
4. Check Plus DI crosses above Minus DI
5. If all conditions true, set buy = 1
populate_buy_trend.output_description: DataFrame with buy column indicating buy signals (1 = buy, 0 = no action)
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies bullish trend initiation when directional movement favors upward price action with sufficient trend strength.

populate_sell_trend.description: Generate sell signals when Minus DI crosses above Plus DI with very strong trend
populate_sell_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 43 (strong trend required)
2. Check Minus DI > 22 (bearish strength)
3. Check Plus DI > 20 (directional filter)
4. Check Minus DI crosses above Plus DI
5. If all conditions true, set sell = 1
populate_sell_trend.output_description: DataFrame with sell column indicating sell signals (1 = sell, 0 = no action)
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies bearish trend reversal when directional movement strongly favors downward price action in trending markets.

indicators.name: ADX
indicators.description: Average Directional Index - measures trend strength

indicators.name: Plus DI
indicators.description: Plus Directional Indicator - measures upward price movement

indicators.name: Minus DI
indicators.description: Minus Directional Indicator - measures downward price movement

indicators.name: SAR
indicators.description: Parabolic Stop and Reverse - trend following indicator

buy_conditions.description: Bullish directional crossover with trend confirmation
buy_conditions.logic: ADX > 16 AND Minus_DI > 4 AND Plus_DI > 20 AND Plus_DI crosses above Minus_DI

sell_conditions.description: Bearish directional crossover with strong trend
sell_conditions.logic: ADX > 43 AND Minus_DI > 22 AND Plus_DI > 20 AND Minus_DI crosses above Plus_DI
